publicationStmt.publisher: Schenker Documents Online in association with the Centre for Computing in the Humanities

sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Second wife of Schenker's elder brother Wilhelm Schenker, thus Schenker's sister-in-law. Wilhelm and she had children, though their names are unknown. Wilhelm's son Anton [Tonschl] was evidently by his first wife (whose first name is unknown). It is possible that was related to the Bedna≈ô family, and was thus Heinrich and Jeanette Schenker's link to that family.

div.head: Correspondence:
div.p: No letters from Dodi herself are known to survive, but among the letters from Heinrich and Jeanette (OJ 5/38) are paragraphs addressed directly to her.
